title: Air Dry® - Self Structure Crew Neck Performance Tee - Slim Fit T-Shirt
description:
Product Details

Fabric type: Polyester
Weave type: Knit
Pattern: Structured
Length: Regular Length
Neck Type/ Collar: Crew Neck
Sleeve Type: Performance Core
Sleeve Style: Half Sleeve
Fit Type: Slim Fit
Occasion: Sportwear

Description

Push limits and power through every workout with this Modern Activewear Slim Fit T-Shirt, engineered with Air Dry® technology for peak performance and breathability. Whether you're at the gym or training outdoors, this top supports your every move.

  • Advanced Air Dry® Polyester: Crafted from innovative moisture-wicking fabric that draws sweat away from the body, helping you stay cool, dry, and focused throughout your activity.

  • Structured Knit Pattern: Designed for durability and flexibility, the textured knit allows dynamic movement while retaining shape during intense performance.

  • Crew Neck Design: A clean and classic neckline that offers a snug yet breathable fit – perfect for layering or wearing solo during high-intensity sessions.

  • Performance Core Half Sleeves: Designed for function and freedom, these sleeves deliver optimal shoulder mobility while maintaining a sleek silhouette.

  • Slim Fit Athletic Cut: Contours to your body for a streamlined look that enhances movement without restriction.

  • Regular Length for Coverage: Provides the right amount of coverage for lifting, running, or stretching without riding up.

  • Ideal for Active Lifestyles: Whether you're into HIIT, running, training, or sports, this top delivers all-day comfort and performance-ready support.

Wash and Care

Machine Wash 30°C. Wash Dark Colours Separately. Do Not Bleach. Tumble Dry Low. Warm Iron. Do Not Dry Clean. Do Not Iron On Embellishment

Elevate your athleisure wardrobe with the Cool It Tees, designed for ultimate comfort and style. Crafted from a soft blend of polyester and spandex, this t-shirt is perfect for both workouts and casual outings.

Soft & Comfortable: Made from a blend of 95% polyester and 5% elastane, this t-shirt offers a soft touch and flexibility for all-day wear.
Solid Pattern: The sleek solid design makes it easy to pair with various bottoms, from joggers to shorts, for a cohesive look.
Crew Neck Design: The classic crew neck adds a timeless touch, ensuring a smart appearance for any occasion.
Half Sleeves: Designed with half sleeves, this tee keeps you cool while providing a relaxed fit.
Regular Length: The regular length ensures it sits perfectly for a balanced and comfortable fit.
Regular Fit: The regular fit offers a comfortable silhouette, ideal for both athleisure wear and everyday activities.

Wash and Care

title: Trendy Oversize Tie - Dye Tees
description:
Product Details

Pattern: Graphic
Length: Regular Length
Top Length: 104
Neck Type/ Collar: Crew Neck
Style:T-Shirt
Sleeve Type: Half Sleeve
Fit Type: Oversize
Pockets: Patch Pocket, No, 1
Occasion: Casual Wear

Description

Make a bold statement with the Oversized Graphic Cotton T-Shirt, where everyday comfort meets expressive design—crafted for those who like their casual wear relaxed and full of personality.

  • 100% Cotton Fabric: Made from breathable, skin-friendly cotton that offers a soft hand feel and keeps you cool and comfortable all day.

  • Graphic Print Pattern: Features standout visual elements that add a splash of individuality and streetwear-inspired flair.

  • Crew Neck Design: A timeless round neckline that provides a laid-back, classic look and easy pairing with any outfit.

  • Oversized Fit: Designed for extra room and a relaxed silhouette, perfect for street-style appeal or layering over fitted basics.

  • Half Sleeves: Offers a casual vibe with unrestricted movement—ideal for daily wear or off-duty styling.

  • No Patch Pocket – Clean Front: Minimalist front design keeps the focus on the graphic, giving it a sleek, modern look.

  • Versatile Style – Everyday Statement: Whether you’re heading to a café, a day out, or lounging with friends, this tee brings comfort and standout style to the forefront.

Wash and Care

Machine Wash 40°C. Wash Dark Colours Separately. Do Not Bleach. Tumble Dry Low. Warm Iron. Do Not Dry Clean
